Hi list,

I'm currently using Heritrix 1.14.4 for crawling some
websites an=
d chose it specifically because
it supports incremental crawling in the AR =
Frontier.

Here are the more important settings I'm using:

Extractors:
org=
.archive.crawler.extractor.HTTPContentDigest
org.archive.crawler.extractor.=
ChangeEvaluator

org.archive.cra=
wler.extractor.ExtractorHTML

terProcessor

Post Processors:

Updater
org.archive.crawler.postprocessor.LinksScoper
org.archive.crawler.p=
ostprocessor.FrontierScheduler

tor


I'm testing this on my own website, with all the wait
intervals set t=
o 30s. While the logs show that
Heritrix detects changes, I'm not seeing th=
e
changes reflected in the mirror directory. Am I doing
something wrong her=
e?

Thanks!
